parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Executes the given [[Multiplayer_Server_Commands|server command]].
* Available commands for execution can be found with [[serverCommandAvailable]].
* Commands that can be executed can be found with [[serverCommandExecutable]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> If [[serverCommand]] is executed on a client, it must be executed from [[isUIContext | UI context]], such as ''onButtonDown'' or similar events (see [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers]]).</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> As of <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.39 an alternative version of [[serverCommand]] can be used on dedicated server and headless clients. It requires a password, set with <tt>serverCommandPassword</tt> in [[server.cfg]] and passed to the command as an argument (See Alt Syntax).</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[serverCommand]] command

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> command : [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - always [[true]] for some reason (since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.39 also [[false]] if a non valid command is used ("#blah"))

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> password [[serverCommand]] command <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.39</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template> <template><title>Icon</title><part><name index="1"/><value>serverExec</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>32</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> password : [[String]] - password defined in [[server.cfg]] with <tt>serverCommandPassword</tt> param
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> command : [[String]] - server command

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if password is correct

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[serverCommand]] "#logout";</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Create button on the main map which will show userlist to anyone who clicks on it:
<code>[[with]] [[uiNamespace]] [[do]] 
{
	ctrl = [[findDisplay]] 12 [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscButton", -1];
	ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,0.5,0.1];
	ctrl [[ctrlSetText]] "USERLIST";
	ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
	ctrl [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["ButtonDown", 
	{
		[[serverCommand]] "#userlist";
	}];
};</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3 </name>=<value> <code>[[serverCommand]] [[format]] ["#kick %1",_name];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x4 </name>=<value> <code>_passwordWasOK = "MyServerCommandPassword" [[serverCommand]] "#lock";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[serverCommandAvailable]], [[serverCommandExecutable]], [[admin]], [[isUIContext]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
